2.title: The Mystery of Thomas Beale's Treasure

episode of.title: Raiders of the Lost Past (TV Series 2012– )

2.plot: Brothers Clayton and George Hart try to crack the ciphers left by Beale that allegedly hide the location of hidden treasure.

3.title: The Priest His Lover and the Holy Grail

episode of.title: Raiders of the Lost Past (TV Series 2012– )

3.plot: Uncovering the fraud behind the myth that spawned Dan Brown's book "The Da Vinci Code". For more than 70 years the small French village of Rennes-le-Chateau has lured treasure hunters with a strange tale about a local priest.

4.title: The Mystery of the Spider Rocks

episode of.title: Raiders of the Lost Past (TV Series 2012– )

4.plot: A map guides Dave Arnold after a hidden treasure in Texas.

1.title: Hitler and the Spear of Destiny

episode of.title: Raiders of the Lost Past (TV Series 2012– )

1.plot: The armies of Nazi Germany crossed the border with Austria, but when Hitler arrived in Vienna just 2 days later, the very first thing he did was to go to the Hofburg museum to lay claim to what appeared to be a simple Roman spear head. This spear head was something that Hitler had apparently coveted ever since he had first nurtured ambitions to become the ruler of a new German Reich.

2.title: The Quest for Noah's Ark

episode of.title: Raiders of the Lost Past (TV Series 2012– )

2.plot: This 50 minute documentary tells the story of three of these Christians and their expeditions which were full of danger and despair as they looked for Noah's Ark.

3.title: The Missing Eighth Wonder of the World

episode of.title: Raiders of the Lost Past (TV Series 2012– )

3.plot: In 1941 the Germans looted one of the Soviet Union's most important art works, called the Amber Room. An extraordinary series of C18 amber screens worth millions of pounds and considered, by many, the 8th wonder of the world. It was taken to the Baltic city of Konigsberg. 4 years later at the end of the war, it had vanished. So began one of the greatest treasure hunts of the twentieth century.

4.title: The Hunt for Pirate Treasure

episode of.title: Raiders of the Lost Past (TV Series 2012– )

4.plot: The effort of actor Richard Knight to find the lost treasure of privateer William Kidd.

5.title: The Real King Solomon's Mines

episode of.title: Raiders of the Lost Past (TV Series 2012– )

5.plot: A rich and exotic Queen of Sheba brought King Solomon gifts of gold from the mystical land of Ophir. But where was Ophir? Where had all that gold come from? For 1000 of years, ancient Greeks, Renaissance adventurers, Victorian explorers, and modern day scientists have searched for the source of Solomon's gold. A mysterious place that would famously become known as King Solomon's Mines.

6.title: The Lost Sword of the Samurai

episode of.title: Raiders of the Lost Past (TV Series 2012– )

6.plot: The Honjo Masamune is perhaps the greatest Japanese sword ever made. Forged in the 13th century by the great sword smith Masamune it became the ceremonial sword of the ruling Tokugawa shoguns for 250 years. After their fall from power in 1868 the great sword continued to be passed down the generations into the 20th century, but in the aftermath of the Second World War it disappeared.

7.title: Himmler and the Holy Grail

episode of.title: Raiders of the Lost Past (TV Series 2012– )

7.plot: The Holy Grail, the most prized relic of Christianity has been shrouded in mystery for centuries. Said to be the cup used by Christ at the last supper it is believed by many to hold miraculous powers. For centuries Kings, knights and treasure hunters have sought it, but it has always remained elusive and out of reach of human hands.

8.title: The Hunt for the Book of Spells

episode of.title: Raiders of the Lost Past (TV Series 2012– )

8.plot: It's one of the most influential books ever written. It's said to have inspired early Freemasons, to provide the wisdom behind the Tarot and to have underpinned a string of 20th century esoteric cults. Yet after years of looking for it nobody has ever found the original text.

9.title: The Lost City of El Dorado

episode of.title: Raiders of the Lost Past (TV Series 2012– )

9.plot: Legend tells that somewhere in South America there is a great city of gold, El Dorado, a fabulously rich and sophisticated kingdom that was once home to thousands of people living deep in the Amazon jungle. To most people it was just a legend. But for British explorer, Colonel Percy Fawcett, it was real. Convinced he knew the location of this lost world, he spent years searching for it.

10.title: The Nazis and the Book of Power

episode of.title: Raiders of the Lost Past (TV Series 2012– )

10.plot: Heinrich Himmler sent his SS solders to locate a treasure so valuable to Nazi ideology that it must be recovered at all costs. The item they are searching for is an ancient manuscript, a perfect copy of a book written nearly two thousand years before in Rome which the Nazis call the birth certificate for the German race. The book is known as the Germania; for the Nazis it is the "Book of Power".

11.title: Raider Ron and the Lost Ark

episode of.title: Raiders of the Lost Past (TV Series 2012– )

11.plot: Ron Wyatt claimed he had finally found the Ark of the Covenant but he had no witnesses and could produce no evidence. Many people believe him but professional archaeologists are sceptical. New archaeological evidence in Israel suggests that there may not just have been one grand golden ark, but many simple everyday portable shrines called in Hebrew 'Ark of God'.

12.title: The Search for the Crystal Skulls

episode of.title: Raiders of the Lost Past (TV Series 2012– )

12.plot: In 1924, a young girl found an extraordinary object in the jungles of Central America. It was a beautiful skull from a single block of pure quartz crystal. All her life Anna Mitchell-Hedges claimed that her skull had telepathic powers.

13.title: The Quest for the True Cross

episode of.title: Raiders of the Lost Past (TV Series 2012– )

13.plot: Fifteen years ago Michael Hesemann, a German historian, set out to establish the authenticity of one of the most important Christian relics ever found. It's called the Titulus Crucis, or Title of the Cross, a small piece of wood that, it's claimed, hung on the cross of Christ announcing his name and crime. It's displayed in a church in Rome. But is it real or a mediaeval fake?

1.title: The Nazi Hunt for Atlantis

episode of.title: Raiders of the Lost Past (TV Series 2012– )

1.plot: Heinrich Himmler believed that the Aryan race were descended from the Atlanteans. He claimed that the inhabitants of Atlantis fled to the Himalayas when their city sank. So a German expedition was sent to Tibet to prove this.

2.title: The Lost Spanish Galleon

episode of.title: Raiders of the Lost Past (TV Series 2012– )

2.plot: Mel Fisher dedicates his entire life and savings to finding the Spanish galleon, Nuestra Señora de Atocha. Can his optimism prevail where the odds are against him?

3.title: The Lost Dutchman's Mine

episode of.title: Raiders of the Lost Past (TV Series 2012– )

3.plot: The story of Adolph Ruth who set off into the Superstition Mountains of Arizona in 1931 in search of the location of a rich gold mine. His skull was found 6 months later with two bullet holes in it. Had he found the lost mine?

4.title: The Legend of Kruger's Millions

episode of.title: Raiders of the Lost Past (TV Series 2012– )

4.plot: During the Boer War instructions were made by President Paul Kruger to hide the nation's wealth if the British looked like taking Pretoria. South African councilor Atholl Stark searches for the gold with the help of a Zulu family.

5.title: The Search for King Arthur's Bones

episode of.title: Raiders of the Lost Past (TV Series 2012– )

5.plot: The story of Edwardian archaeologist Frederick Bligh Bond who tried to prove the existence of King Arthur by locating his grave near or under Glastonbury Abbey. His unusual methods included spirit writing and holding séances.

6.title: The Hunt for the Garden of Eden

episode of.title: Raiders of the Lost Past (TV Series 2012– )

6.plot: Did the Garden of Eden actually exist? Archaeologist Juris Zarins has set out to prove that it did. Zarins uses the biblical description that it is the source of four major rivers to help him. But two of them have not been found.

7.title: The Lost Library of Ivan the Terrible

episode of.title: Raiders of the Lost Past (TV Series 2012– )

7.plot: Russian archaeologist Ignatius Stelletskii's efforts to locate the library of 16th century ruler Ivan the Terrible. The library is rumored to contain hundreds of books and documents rescued from the sacking of Constantinople.

8.title: The Curse of Montezuma's Gold

episode of.title: Raiders of the Lost Past (TV Series 2012– )

8.plot: In 1914 prospector Freddie Crystal arrived in the town of Kanab, Utah with a remarkable story. He claimed to have found a map in Mexico that revealed the location of Aztec ruler Montezuma's lost treasure. But was the area cursed?

9.title: The Relics of Joan of Arc

episode of.title: Raiders of the Lost Past (TV Series 2012– )

9.plot: Forensic expert Philippe Charlier tries to uncover the truth behind the remains found in a Paris pharmacy in 1867, which the Church have accepted are the relics of Saint Joan of Arc. Is there any evidence to prove they are?

10.title: The Quest for the Labyrinth

episode of.title: Raiders of the Lost Past (TV Series 2012– )

10.plot: Archaeologists have attempted to pinpoint the location of the Labyrinth, a maze like structure said to have housed the Minotaur. English archaeologist Arthur Evans became convinced it was on Crete when he excavated Knossos.

11.title: The Lost Jewels of Helen of Troy

episode of.title: Raiders of the Lost Past (TV Series 2012– )

11.plot: In May 1873 Heinrich Schliemann found a cache of gold and jewelery during his search for the city of Troy at Hissarlik, Turkey. He claimed they were from the time of the Trojan war but some think they predate it by 1,200 years.

12.title: The Secret Within the Dead Sea Scroll

episode of.title: Raiders of the Lost Past (TV Series 2012– )

12.plot: Could a Jewish Treasure lost when the Temple was sacked be hidden in caves in Jordan? John Marco Allegro, a maverick young scholar was convinced it was. It began with the discovery of the Dead Sea Scrolls in 1946.

13.title: The Shogun's Lost Treasure

episode of.title: Raiders of the Lost Past (TV Series 2012– )

13.plot: Legend says that 19th century Shoguns hid gold coins worth 10 trillion Yen on Mount Akagi to keep them from falling into the hands of the incoming Meji government. Three generations of one family have searched for the coins.

episode of.title: Raiders of the Lost Past (TV Series 2012– )

imdb.title: Raiders of the Lost Past
plot: A series of documentaries exploring modern efforts to solve historic mysteries.
